basic.description: Students will learn the fundamentals of electrical signal acquisition, processing and interpretation for biomechanics and neuromuscular physiology applications.  Laboratory exercises involving electromyography data acquisition and analysis will be used to illustrate key principles.   (1.0 credit units). EXCLUSION:  KHS 851*, KHS 857*
basic.subject: RHBS
basic.title: Instrumentation and Electromyography
